packages.title: Historic Bogotá Discovery
packages.description: Explore the heart of Colombia's capital with visits to La Candelaria historic district, Gold Museum, and Bolívar Square. Walk through cobblestone streets and discover the rich colonial heritage of this fascinating city.
highlights: Guided walking tour of La Candelaria

packages.title: Cultural Immersion Experience
packages.description: Dive deep into Bogotá's vibrant cultural scene with museum visits, local markets, and authentic experiences. Perfect for culture enthusiasts wanting to understand the soul of Colombian capital.
highlights: Botero Museum and National Museum visits

packages.title: Bogotá Gastronomic Adventure
packages.description: Taste your way through Bogotá's incredible culinary scene, from street food to high-end restaurants. Experience the diversity of Colombian cuisine in the nation's gastronomic capital.
highlights: Food tour in La Macarena neighborhood
Coffee plantation visit near the city

packages.title: Adventure & Nature Escape
packages.description: Combine urban exploration with natural adventures around Bogotá. Perfect for active travelers who want to experience both city culture and Colombia's stunning landscapes.
highlights: Guatavita Lake and El Dorado legend tour

packages.title: Business & Conference Package
packages.description: Perfect for business travelers combining work with leisure. Includes premium accommodations, business facilities, and carefully selected cultural experiences during free time.

packages.title: Family Fun Bogotá
packages.description: Family-friendly adventure through Bogotá with activities suitable for all ages. Create lasting memories exploring Colombia's capital with your loved ones.
highlights: Family bike tour in safe areas
